thread.title: Murphy: Justin Anderson is the key to the Sixers' deal
thread.title_full: Murphy: Justin Anderson is the key to the Sixers' deal

author: David Murphy
title: Murphy: Justin Anderson is the key to the Sixers' deal
text:
Murphy: Justin Anderson is the key to the Sixers' deal Updated: February 23, 2017 — 12:20 PM EST 10 Share 0 Comment Popular Stories Twitter icon 
In October, an NBA scout gave a glowing review of Anderson to Sports Illustrated , opining that he considered the second-year guard to be “almost as good a player as Harrison Barnes,” 
“Justin Anderson is gonna be good. I wonder how long of a leash [coach Rick] Carlisle will have with him. Rick prefers to play two guards, two smaller guards who are good pick-and-roll players, and that's not Justin. … I actually think Justin Anderson is almost as good a player as Harrison Barnes. Maybe not quite as good as a scorer, but rebounding, shot-blocking, he'll be a decent shooter this year. He'll be a solid piece of their rotation. 
Anderson, the No. 21 overall pick in the 2015 draft out of Virginia, had had a limited role in the Mavs’ 
In December, ESPN ran a story on Anderson’s regression 
“Anderson’ 
“He’s very limited as an offensive player -- his strength is his finishing ability, never mind his blooper miss late in Saturday’s loss -- and he often looks tentative and lost on that end of the floor.
